name: Circle Hook
description:
Tap to Connect to the hook ring and swing and Make Jumps that can Help you Get through the Obstacles that stands in your Way In order to get to the finish Line!

in this Game you are A circle That has Hook Gun.
Complete All the Levels you come through.

For that you Need to do 3 Simple Steps:
🔹Tap to Connect to hook and swing.
🔸Tap Your Screen To Hook your Circle to the hook ring and release to Let go.
🔹Use The Jumping Platforms to Help you Get Momentum With The Hook ring to Reach the Finish Line.

🔴 You Can find MANY Challenging Levels & Game modes Such as :

🔵 The ENDLESS Challenge - A Blue Barrier is Chasing you while you escape it through swinging between Platforms And Not fall To the Dangerous Water Your Challenge is to RECIEVE the Highest Score Against Other Players from This world .

🔷Besides that we Got our Main Mode! - You need to swing with your circle between Platforms While Avoiding The Red Barrier and Finding your path to the Finish Line To Complete Each Level and Unlock new Characters From our Shop With the Coins you Collect in the Levels You Complete.

Do you Think you can Complete These Challenges In Success? Prove It!

Also it would be appreciated if you Support me in google play Link Bellow
